entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. James 12:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets ending this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
